# withAllAvailableDescriptors

**Type Property**

The mutable font collection that matches all registered fonts.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying class var withAllAvailableDescriptors: NSMutableFontCollection { get }
```

## Creating a Font Collection

- **init(descriptors:)**: Creates a mutable font collection containing the fonts that match the specified font descriptors.
- **init(locale:)**: Creates a mutable font collection containing fonts suitable for the specified locale.
- **init(name:)**: Creates a mutable named font collection object.
- **init(name:visibility:)**: Creates a mutable font collection with the specified name and font visibility.
